info.title: IconFinder
info.description: Give your users instant access to more than 300,000 icons.

get.description: Get details about a specific author identified by a unique ID.
List all categories sorted ascendingly by their identifier.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: identifier of the last category received. If empty, the count first categories are returned.

get.description: Search through icons by various criteria. The returned list of icons is ordered descendingly by popularit

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of icons to include in the result. Accepted values are between 1 and 100. Default 10.

parameters.name: maximum_size
parameters.description: Maximum icon size to include in search result. Default 512.

parameters.name: minimum_size
parameters.description: Minimum icon size to include in search result. Default 0.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Result offset. Starts from 0, resulting in the first count icons being returned.

get.description: Get details about a specific license by its unique ID.

parameters.name: licenseID
parameters.description: The unique id of the license

get.description: Get details about a specific style identified by its identifier.
Get details about a specific category identified by its identifier.

parameters.name: categoryID
parameters.description: The unique ID of the category.

get.description: Get details about a specific ico

parameters.name: iconID
parameters.description: The unique ID of the icon.

get.summary: List all icons in an icon set
get.description: Provides a list of all icons in an icon set sorted descendingly by the popularity of the icons.List all icons in an icon set

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Icon ID of the last icon received. If empty, the count most popular icons are returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of icons to include in the result. Accepted values are between 1 and 100. Default 10.

parameters.name: List all icons in an icon set

get.description: List all styles sorted ascendingly by their identifier.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: identifier of the last style received. If empty, the count first styles are returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of styles to include in the result. Accepted values are between 1 and 100. Default 10.

get.description: Get details about a specific user.
Get details about a specific user.
